title: Crawling Back To Me - Semitone (IIT Madras)
description: Semitone was a band we formed at IIT Madras. Crawling Back To Me was our first original. I particularly love the work we did on this one. (Wait till the end for the dual solo!)

title: Master Of Puppets, at IIT Madras Open Air Theatre
description: A day before the show we decided we'll do this, and one of the best experiences of my life. We had to recover this from multiple mobile recordings!

title: Hangar 18, in a jam room
description: We decided we have to cover a dual guitar song before my roommate from undergrad days graduated. So we covered this one
